DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect remote ischemic preconditioning cognitive function patient undergo off-pump coronary artery bypass graft .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Cognitive Function After Off-Pump Coronary Artery Bypass Graft
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo elective offpump coronary artery bypass graft surgery Emergency operation Preoperative use inotropic drug mechanical assistant device Ejection fraction le 30 % Combined operation use CPB valve surgery Previous psychiatric neurologic disorder Inability perform cognitive function test
